pages.text: $(li)The Bone is hard bio-material that can be used to craft Bone Meal, Sopa De Macaco, an Bone Armor, Depth Star, Caged Heart, Fossil Bait and Bone Ranker.$(br)$(li)Lumberjacks will exchange the Bones by Emeralds.

$(li)Bones are placed over all the Soul Sand and Soul Soil in the Soul Sand Valley biome, so you can obtain a lot of bones there.$(br)$(li)Skeletons, Baby Skeletons, Xylophone Skeletons, Skeleton Villagers, Skeleton Horses, Strays, Baby Strays, Wither Sekeletons, Baby Wither Skeletons, Bone Serpents, Forgottens and Soul Vultures may drop this item.
